mapper.insert: insert into t_inter ( create_date, modify_date, doc_id, module_id, name, path, method, scheme, summary, description, consume, produce, deprecated, sort_weight ) values ( #{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{docId}, #{moduleId}, #{name}, #{path}, #{method}, #{scheme}, #{summary}, #{description}, #{consume}, #{produce}, #{deprecated}, #{sortWeight} )
mapper.select: select i.*, m.id as module_id, m.name as module_name from t_inter i left join t_module m on i.module_id = m.id where i.id = #{interId} and i.doc_id = #{docId}
